title: Troubleshooting - Voicemail Not Working
description: A customer reports that their voicemail service is not picking up calls.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and verify that voicemail is an active feature on their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms voicemail is provisioned for the customer's line.

tasks.description: Check the call forwarding settings on the customer's account to ensure they are correctly pointing to the voicemail system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that call forwarding is incorrectly disabled.

tasks.description: Reset the call forwarding settings to the default voicemail configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the tool to reset the settings.
